Tool

NameChange Longitudinal Range for Grids
ID13
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2012
Specificationgrid

Description

Change the longitudinal range of grids using geographic coordinates, i.e. from 0 - 360 to -180 - 180 and vice versa.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Input Grid list (input)INPUT
Output
Output (*)Grid list (optional output)OUTPUT
Options
DirectionChoiceDIRECTIONAvailable Choices: [0] 0 - 360 >> -180 - 180 [1] -180 - 180 >> 0 - 360 Default: 0
(*) optional
